name: HSPC_HIS_COMP_QUESN_INST
description: This table extracts the related multiple response Hospice Item Set - Z0400 Questions Completed Inst (I LHO 912) item, which is the instant that the Hospice Item Set question was completed or updated.

columns.name: DATASET_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the data set record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: QUESTION_COMP_INST_DTTM
columns.description: This column displays the instant that a Hospice Item Set (HIS) question was completed or updated. This correlates directly to item Z0400 on the HIS.  Item Z0400 indicates who actually answered the question.
